thread.title: Man with world’s longest 18.9in penis tries to have sex – it doesn't go well

title: Man with world’s longest 18.9in penis tries to have sex – it doesn't go well
text:
Man with world’s longest 18.9in penis tries to have sex – it doesn't go well Man with world’s longest 18.9in penis tries to have sex – it doesn't go well THE man with the world’s longest penis has refused to have penile reduction surgery and says he wants to become a porn star. WARNING GRAPHIC IMAGES. / Published 20th January 2017 
The man with the world’s longest penis , has decided he wants to use his 18.9 inch to become a porn star. 
Mexican native, Roberto Esquivel Cabrera, refused penile reduction surgery from an adult entertainment company who offered to pay for it because he wants to use his giant asset to launch his porn career. 
"I would like to be a porn star and I think I would make a lot of money over there [the US],” Roberto said. 
Roberto and his colossal penis made headlines in 2015 after a video of him weighing his penis went viral . His 18.9 inch member broke the previous world record held by American actor, Jonah Falcon, whose penis is 9.5 inches flaccid and 13.5 inches erect. 
"I am happy with my penis, I know nobody has the size I have. I would like to be in the Guinness Book of Records but they don't recognise this record,” the 54-year-old said. The weirdest sex records in the world Tuesday, 23rd August 2016 Could you compete in the sexual world Olympics? Whether its downing semen or speedily whipping off bras one-handed, these people will be remembered for winning these weird world records. 1 / 9 The biggest natural breasts are a size 102ZZZ 
BARCROFT NSFW: Roberto has to keep his penis wrapped to keep it from chaffing 
Despite his contentment with his size, members of the medical community have urged Roberto to have a penile reduction. “I would like to be a porn star and I think I would make a lot of money” Roberto Esquivel Cabrera 
"We have advised him 'Mr Roberto, the best thing for you is that the doctors give a normal shape to your penis so that it doesn't hurt you, in order to have sexual relationships, in order to have children’,” said doctor Jesus David Salazar Gonzalez. 
"But he doesn't accept it, he'd rather have a penis bigger than the rest of the people.” 
Prior scans of Roberto’s penis have confirmed what doctors suspected – he has an abnormally long foreskin.
